title: Heraclea
description: An ancient settlement on the Black Sea coast of Asia Minor at modern Karadeniz EreÄŸli in Turkey. It is often referred to as Heraclea Pontica (or Heraclea in Pontus) to distinguish it from other cities with the same name.
